content.question: Together with the stage directions, Mildred’s words in line 9 (“Well . . . for you”) and line 21 (“Well . . . guessing”) suggest that she

choices.label: loves getting to spend time with Richard
enjoys teasing Richard about his love life
is happy that Richard and Muriel are getting back together
is surprised by Richard and Muriel’s commitment to each other

content.answer: enjoys teasing Richard about his love life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
